---
category: news
title: "How does WNIJ use artificial intelligence in the newsroom?"
excerpt: "No, robots do not write our stories at WNIJ. We don't use fake bylines either. But we do use some applications in our newsroom that help our reporters work more efficiently while making sure our stories are discoverable on the web."
